article_title: How American Doctors Lost Their Professional Autonomy

article_metadata.description: About the same time that the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services was botching the rollout of healthcare.gov, the agency also announced its successful creation of two mobile apps designed to help doctors keep track the stuff they get from drug makers.
